statements: DELETE FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' AND birth_date < '1990-01-01';
DELETE FROM patients WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%cancer%' AND treatment = 'Chemotherapy';
DELETE FROM patients p LEFT JOIN medical_records mr ON p.patient_id = mr.patient_id WHERE p.gender = 'Male' AND mr.medical_condition = 'Hypertension';
DELETE FROM medical_records WHERE record_id IN (SELECT record_id FROM medical_records WHERE treatment = 'Surgery');
DELETE FROM research_data WHERE patient_id = (SELECT patient_id FROM patients WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe');
DELETE FROM PatientVisits WHERE patient_id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth < '2000-01-01');
DELETE FROM MedicalHistory WHERE history_id IN (SELECT history_id FROM MedicalHistory WHERE condition = 'Diabetes' AND end_date < '2022-01-01');
